name: Developing Event Registration Processes
description: Creating a smooth and efficient registration process for your event attendees.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

form.title: Registration Form Fields
form.description: Select the information you want to collect from attendees during registration (e.g., name, email, company, dietary restrictions).

dates.title: Event Dates
dates.description: The start and end dates of your event

payment.title: Payment Gateway (Optional)
payment.description: If collecting payment during registration, choose your preferred payment gateway.

ui_metadata.value: Stripe (or any preferred payment gateway can be integrated here)

ticket_tiers.title: Ticket Tiers (Optional)
ticket_tiers.description: If offering different ticket types (e.g., free, paid, VIP), list them here with their pricing and details.

ui_metadata.value: General Admission: $75 (includes access to all sessions, expo hall, and lunch) Student Discount: $50 (valid student ID required) VIP Experience: $150 (includes general admission benefits, plus priority seating, exclusive networking reception, and a commemorative gift bag)

confimation_email.title: Confirmation Emails (Optional)
confimation_email.description: Enable automatic confirmation emails sent to attendees upon successful registration.

ui_metadata.value: Yes (automatic confirmation emails will be sent upon successful registration)

registration_time.title: Registration Start & End Dates
registration_time.description: Specify the timeframe when registration will be open for attendees.

ui_metadata.value: Registration Opens: Monday, July 1st, 2024 Registration Closes: Friday, October 18th, 2024
